report.title: UKBMS Visit Summary list
report.description: A list of the number of sites and visits recorded for each species, with filters for user, date start and end.
report.query: select #field_sql# from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl JOIN occurrences o ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = cttl.id AND o.deleted = false AND #website_filter# JOIN samples s ON o.sample_id=s.id and s.deleted=false JOIN samples p ON s.parent_id = p.id AND p.deleted = false AND (CAST(p.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR p.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#',extract(YEAR from NOW())||'-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR p.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#',extract(YEAR from NOW())||'-12-31') as date)) JOIN locations l ON p.location_id = l.id AND l.deleted = false #joins# WHERE (CAST(p.created_by_id AS character varying)='#user_id#' OR '#user_id#' = '') GROUP by cttl.preferred_taxon, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) #order_by#
report.field_sql: cttl.preferred_taxon as taxon, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as common, count(distinct p.id) num_visits, count(distinct l.id) num_sites

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user, or leave blank for all users
